messages.subject: independence, assisted babysitting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/9/01 8:53:51 AM, louisam1@juno.com writes:  The best
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/9/01 8:53:51 AM, louisam1@... writes:

<< I've told her that she is welcome to baby sit here in our house
when I'm home. >>

The best babysitter I ever had was a ten year old neighbor who used to kind
of flow back and forth between her house and ours, with her mom home and me
home. That lasted three years, off an on (often when the girl needed money
or was bored). She had little sisters too, and so Holly was THRILLED to "go
with Amy" anytime! When it started, Holly was two, and she was very sad when
that family moved, when she was five or six. She asked about them just the
other day, but I've lost contact.

Sandra
